content.description: Super classic Red Rocks V12 with 25+ hand moves. Boulder itself is very crimpy and full of high tension moves. Spicy topout.
content.protection: Plenty of pads for the overhanging face and spotters/pads for the top out.
content.location: Scramble up and around several boulders before reaching the obvious cave directly across from American Exotica.

content.description: Crocodile Smile starts low in the left side of the Giant Boulder pit, with hands matched on a large left facing ear shaped hold. Climb through steep bulge, with crimps and chicken heads. Committing crux with horizontal body position, but easily padded flat rock below. Top out onto shelf directly above. Great roofish climbing, with flowy body movement. Always shaded. A must do in the moderate range.Moulin SNV Bouldering 2 Guidebook calls this v6 "soft in the grade", I believe solid v5 is appropriate. Problem #126, gateway canyon, in SNV Bouldering 2 guidebook.
content.protection: 3+ pads ideally, spotter for top out
content.location: Located on Giant Boulder, north east side, farthest left problem out of the pit.

content.description: A sector of multiple huge boulders stacked on top of one another which host multiple amazing and difficult lines.
